section.name: Artifact Task
section.p: The artifact task generates a descriptor for a plugin compliant with the Avalon Repository specification. This descriptor is a property file containing factory information and staged classloader description. Classpath references will be group relative to API, SPI and IMPL runtime dependencies.
section.pre:
